title: Intel’s Bullish Forecast, Next Week’s Fed Decision, Investing in Female-Founded Startups
itunes:title: Intel’s Bullish Forecast, Next Week’s Fed Decision, Investing in Female-Founded Startups
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Semiconductor Reporter Ian King and Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Semiconductor Analyst Anand Srinivasan discuss Intel’s bullish forecast. Jeffrey Cleveland, Chief Economist at Payden & Rygel, previews next week’s Fed decision. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull breaks down Tesla’s efforts to conquer the Chinese EV market. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
